definitions.definition: practical and useful; with little or no decoration

examples.text: Bathrooms don't have to be purely functional.
The office was large and functional rather than welcoming.
Items such as musical instruments may be both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

definitions.definition: having a special purpose; making it possible for somebody to do something or for something to happen

examples.text: a functional disorder *(= an illness caused when an organ of the body fails to perform its function)*
a functional approach to language learning
These units played a key functional role in the military operation.
The hospital will soon be fully functional.
